text: Walk me through a recent backend project you worked on. What was your role and what were your key contributions?
Explain the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases. When would you choose one over the other?
Tell me about a time you had a conflict with a coworker. How did you resolve it?
How would you design a REST API for a simple blog application? What endpoints would you create?
Describe a situation where you had to learn a new technology quickly for a project.
What is the purpose of a Dockerfile and how does it differ from a Docker image?
Tell me about a time you debugged a complex production issue. What was your process?
How would you design a system to handle millions of concurrent users for a real-time application?
Describe a project that failed. What did you learn from that experience?
Explain the concept of idempotency in the context of REST APIs and why it is important.
What are your salary expectations for this role?
Imagine we offered you a salary that is 10% lower than your expectation. How would you respond?
